data.title: Simple A Site Dark Cover Hold
data.description: Throw this simple, yet effective Dark Cover lineup to keep Attackers guessing. This smoke allows you to play in or out of it, catching and isolating fights as shown.

data.title: A Lobby Dark Cover + Paranoia Contest
data.description: At the start of the round, set up like this to contest for space and map control towards the A Site.

data.title: Defense Garage Paranoia Variations
data.description: Use these Paranoia Variations to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through B, C, or Garage.

data.title: A Site One Way Dark Cover + Paranoia
data.description: Use this Dark Cover + Paranoia combo to make it more difficult for the Attackers to push into A Site. Callout that you are using / you want to use your Paranoia before using it so that your teammates can pick up the Short angle as you look long, or to simply flood the site faster.
